an organization that has a particular purpose such as scientific or educational work, or the building where this organization is based
to introduce or start a system, rule, legal process etc
We had no choice but to institute court proceedings against the airline.
an official organization that represents people of a particular profession
the American Institute of Certified Public Accountants
an official organization concerned with research or education
to introduce a new system or rule
The bank instituted a number of cost-cutting measures.
The firm instituted a program to provide retirement benefits for its staff.
